roleset.name: wrap stringy goods into a bale for easy trasport
roleset.note: BALE-V NOTES: Added by Julia. No VNcls. (from bale.01-v)

example.name: All args
example.text: my contractor cut and baled the hay into 1200-lb rolls.

roleset.name: extricate from a difficult situation (like water in sinking boat)
roleset.note: BALE_OUT-V NOTES: Added by Julia. Alternate spelling of 'bail.02'. No VNcls. (from bale.02-v)

example.name: with the boat as direct object
example.text: They-1 're all trying *PRO*-1 to bale out the boat .

example.name: All args
example.text: Over the years the AAA service has baled us out of several tight spots and a couple of downright scary ones.
example.arg: of several tight spots and a couple of downright scary ones
